id.description: The ID of the Product Field

key.description: The key of the Product Field

order_nr.description: Position (index) of the Product Field in the detail view

add_time.description: The Product Field creation time. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

update_time.description: The Product Field last update time. Format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS

last_updated_by_user_id.description: The ID of the last user to update the Product Field

active_flag.description: Whether or not the Product Field is currently active

edit_flag.description: Whether or not the Product Field Name and metadata is editable

add_visible_flag.description: Whether or not the Product Field is visible in the Add Product Modal

important_flag.description: Whether or not the Product Field is marked as important

bulk_edit_allowed.description: Whether or not the Product Field data can be edited

searchable_flag.description: Whether or not the Product Field is searchable

filtering_allowed.description: Whether or not the Product Field value can be used when filtering searches

sortable_flag.description: Whether or not the Product Field is sortable

mandatory_flag.description: Whether or not the Product Field is mandatory when creating products
